
h1. Custom Layout



Custom Layout is used to customize your mail layout to suit the way that you want to view.

h1. Default

With this view type, the navigator pane, messages pane and preview pane will be displayed on a screen.
Click the
!CustomLayoutIcon.gif!
 button in the tool bar and then select *Reset*:


!CustomLayoutMenu.gif!


The screen of this view will be displayed:


!DefaultViewForm.gif!




!1.gif! : Navigator Pane

!2.gif! : Messages Pane

!3.gif! : Preview Pane


h1. Hide the Navigator Pane

You can hide a Navigator Pane by:


Click the
!CustomLayoutIcon.gif!
  button in the tool bar and select *Hide Navigator Pane*:


!CustomLayoutHideNavigatorMenu.gif!


The screen of this view will be displayed:


!HideNavigatorPaneView.gif!


To show a Navigator Pane again, click  the
!CustomLayoutIcon.gif!
  button and select *Show Navigator Pane* in the drop down list menu.



h1. Hide the Messages Pane

 You can hide the Messages Pane by following guides:

Click the
!CustomLayoutIcon.gif!
  button on the tool bar and select *Hide Messages Pane* in the drop down list menu:


!CustomLayoutHideMessagePaneMenu.gif!


The screen of this view will be displayed:


!HideMessagePaneView.gif!


To show the Messages Pane again, click  the
!CustomLayoutIcon.gif!
  button and select *Show Messages Pane* in the drop down list menu.




h1. Hide the Preview Pane

Following these below guides to hide the Preview Pane:

Click the
!CustomLayoutIcon.gif!
  button in the tool bar and select *Hide Preview Pane*:


!CustomLayoutHidePreviewPaneMenu.gif!


The screen of this view will be displayed:


!HidePreviewPaneView.gif!


To show the Preview Pane again, click the
!CustomLayoutIcon.gif!
  button and select *Show Preview Pane* in the drop down list menu.
